name: Ancient Treasure 法爾斯編年史：上古秘寶
name_original: Ancient Treasure 法爾斯編年史：上古秘寶
description:
Falsus Chronicle: Ancient Treasure is a dungeon exploring, Anime style action RPG with Roguelike elements. In this game, dungeon will randomly generate traps, monsters and loots. With our unique “Monster Gem” system, every different choice of classes, weapons, and skill sets effects characters raising multiple possibilities, to fulfil every single dungeon explore with funs!

Story:

The story of Falsus Chronicle: Ancient Treasure takes place just 10 years after the story of Falsus Chronicle: Forgotten Child... Somewhere in Kingdom Rista, a piece of ancient tablet was unearthed… thus the serenity between Kingdom Rista and the nearby Rosenberg Emirates was broken. Our main character, Sir Emil Adams, as a famous archaeologist and inventor, is heading for a ruin at the periphery of Kingdom Rista for an investigation due to a commission from the Rosenberg Emirates. However, this “simple academic investigation” he thought to be has force him involve into an unpredictable storm which is hidden a deeper evil conspiracy…

Features:

During the explorations, Emil will encounter various enemies, players must make good use of the Monster Gems, which are looted from the beaten monsters, to boost character abilities, infuse battle buffs, even upgrade certain skills. No matter you are a player prefers physical attack, magical attack, high critical chance or an atypical melee wizard styles, you can always shape a style according to your preference.

• A roguelite & dungeon exploring game, random generate maps, traps, loots and enemies. Every single entry to a dungeon, it’s a whole new adventure!
• Cute characters and delicate dungeon scenes.
• Companions with different traits; multiple weapon types; unique skills!
• Skill sets determined by character classes and equipped weapon.
• “Monster Gem” reinforcement system, shapes characters with different ability strengths and combat styles.
• Various side quests and rewards.
